articles.title: M2 13-inch MacBook Pro may land in March with unchanged design - AppleInsider
articles.description: The updated 13-inch MacBook Pro with an "M2" chip is expected to arrive in March, but Apple is rumored to keep the same design as the existing M1 model, instead of a revamp to bring it closer to the 14-inch and 16-inch models.
